languages.text: "Обессиленная команда не могла противостоять захватчикам, и тогда из глубин вышли ткачи. Их ритуальный танец-на-острие не прерывался ни сном, ни отдыхом, ибо на одного ткача приходилась сотня врагов. Кровавая паутина начала надрываться, но ткачи держались до тех пор, пока флагман не покинул беснующийся варп".

"The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the spinners emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many spinners fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the turmoil of the warp."
languages.original_text: "Обессиленная команда не могла противостоять захватчикам, и тогда из глубин вышли ткачи. Их ритуальный танец-на-острие не прерывался ни сном, ни отдыхом, ибо на одного ткача приходилась сотня врагов. Кровавая паутина начала надрываться, но ткачи держались до тех пор, пока флагман не покинул беснующийся варп".

traits.locale_text: "Emaciated and exhausted, the crew could put up no resistance to the invaders, and that was when the weavers emerged out of the depths. Their ritual bladetip dance left them without a moment to sleep or rest, for each weaver was facing a hundred enemies. The Bloodspun Web was beginning to tear, but the weavers held out until the flagship left the Archenemy's domain."

"Emaciated and exhausted, the crew could put up no resistance to the invaders, and that was when the weavers emerged out of the depths. Their ritual bladetip dance left them without a moment to sleep or rest, for each weaver was facing a hundred enemies. The Bloodspun Web was beginning to tear, but the weavers held out until the flagship left the Archenemy's domain."

"The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the weavers emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many weavers fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the domain of the Archenemy."

"The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the weavers emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many weavers fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the domain of the Archenemy."

"The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the spinners emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many spinners fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the turmoil of the warp."

"The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the spinners emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many spinners fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the turmoil of the Warp."

"The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the spinners emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many spinners fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the turmoil of the warp."

languages.text: « L'équipage, épuisé, était bien trop faible pour résister aux envahisseurs... c'est alors que les tisseurs ont émergé des profondeurs. Seuls face à des centaines d'ennemis, ils n'ont pas faibli et ont dansé la danse mortelle des lames sans prendre le moindre repos jusqu'à ce que le vaisseau amiral quitte les tourments du Warp. Bon nombre des leurs sont morts dans cette bataille. »
languages.original_text: "The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the spinners emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many spinners fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the turmoil of the warp."

traits.locale_text: « L'équipage, épuisé, était bien trop faible pour résister aux envahisseurs... c'est alors que les tisseurs ont émergé des profondeurs. Seuls face à des centaines d'ennemis, ils n'ont pas faibli et ont dansé la danse mortelle des lames sans prendre le moindre repos jusqu'à ce que le vaisseau amiral quitte les tourments du Warp. Bon nombre des leurs sont morts dans cette bataille. »

« L'équipage, épuisé, était bien trop faible pour résister aux envahisseurs... c'est alors que les tisseurs ont émergé des profondeurs. Seuls face à des centaines d'ennemis, ils n'ont pas faibli et ont dansé la danse mortelle des lames sans prendre le moindre repos jusqu'à ce que le vaisseau amiral quitte le domaine du Grand Ennemi. Bon nombre des leurs sont morts dans cette bataille. »

languages.text: «La tripulación agotada estaba demasiado débil y demacrada para resistir ante los invasores... y entonces los tejedores surgieron de las profundidades. Se enfrentaron en solitario a cientos de enemigos, pero ninguno de ellos flaqueó. Ni durmieron ni descansaron hasta que el baile de sus hojas llevó la muerte al último de ellos. Aunque muchos tejedores cayeron, la Red Sanguinolenta se mantuvo firme hasta que la nave insignia abandonó la agitación de la disformidad».
languages.original_text: "The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the spinners emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many spinners fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the turmoil of the warp."

traits.locale_text: «La tripulación agotada estaba demasiado débil y demacrada para resistir ante los invasores... y entonces los tejedores surgieron de las profundidades. Se enfrentaron en solitario a cientos de enemigos, pero ninguno de ellos flaqueó. Ni durmieron ni descansaron hasta que el baile de sus hojas llevó la muerte al último de ellos. Aunque muchos tejedores cayeron, la Red Sanguinolenta se mantuvo firme hasta que la nave insignia abandonó la agitación de la disformidad».

«La tripulación agotada estaba demasiado débil y demacrada para resistir ante los invasores... y entonces los tejedores surgieron de las profundidades. Se enfrentaron en solitario a cientos de enemigos, pero ninguno de ellos flaqueó. Ni durmieron ni descansaron hasta que el baile de sus hojas llevó la muerte al último de ellos. Aunque muchos tejedores cayeron, la Red Sanguinolenta se mantuvo firme hasta que la nave insignia abandonó el dominio del Archienemigo».

languages.text: “所有船员都筋疲力尽。他们虚弱不堪，根本无法抵抗侵略者……但在那个时候，织网者从舰船深处冲了出来。尽管面对着百倍之多的敌人，但他们毫不退缩。他们利刃的舞蹈在敌人之中播撒死亡，没有片刻喘息。尽管许多织网者倒下了，但织血罗网一直都非常顽强，直到旗舰终于离开了亚空间的漩涡为止。”
languages.original_text: "The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the spinners emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many spinners fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the turmoil of the warp."

traits.locale_text: “所有船员都筋疲力尽。他们虚弱不堪，根本无法抵抗侵略者……但在那个时候，织网者从舰船深处冲了出来。尽管面对着百倍之多的敌人，但他们毫不退缩。他们利刃的舞蹈在敌人之中播撒死亡，没有片刻喘息。尽管许多织网者倒下了，但织血罗网一直都非常顽强，直到旗舰终于离开了亚空间的漩涡为止。”
“所有船员都筋疲力尽。他们虚弱不堪，根本无法抵抗侵略者……但在那个时候，织网者从舰船深处冲了出来。尽管面对着百倍之多的敌人，但他们毫不退缩。他们利刃的舞蹈在敌人之中播撒死亡，没有片刻喘息。尽管许多织网者倒下了，但织血罗网一直都非常顽强，直到旗舰终于离开了混沌大敌的领地为止。”

languages.text: 「疲れ果てたクルーは、侵入者に反抗する元気がなかった…。だがその時、ウィーバーが深淵から姿を現した。何百もの敵にたった一人でくじけずに立ち向かった。彼らは眠らず、休まず、刃先のダンスで死をもたらした。多くのウィーバーが倒れたが、ブラッドスパン・ウェブは旗艦が歪みの混乱を徹まで、力強く持ちこたえた」
languages.original_text: "The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the spinners emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many spinners fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the turmoil of the warp."

traits.locale_text: 「疲れ果てたクルーは、侵入者に反抗する元気がなかった…。だがその時、ウィーバーが深淵から姿を現した。何百もの敵にたった一人でくじけずに立ち向かった。彼らは眠らず、休まず、刃先のダンスで死をもたらした。多くのウィーバーが倒れたが、ブラッドスパン・ウェブは旗艦が歪みの混乱を徹まで、力強く持ちこたえた」
「疲れ果てたクルーは、侵入者に反抗する元気がなかった…。だがその時、ウィーバーが深淵から姿を現した。何百もの敵にたった一人でくじけずに立ち向かった。彼らは眠らず、休まず、刃先のダンスで死をもたらした。多くのウィーバーが倒れたが、ブラッドスパン・ウェブは旗艦が仇敵の領域を訪れるまで、力強く持ちこたえた」

languages.text: "Die erschöpfte Crew war zu schwach und ausgemergelt, um den Eindringlingen etwas entgegenzusetzen ... Doch dann kamen die Spinner aus den Tiefen. Sie stellten sich allein gegen hunderte von Feinden, doch sie wankten nicht. Sie schliefen nicht und ruhten nicht, unermüdlich brachte ihr Klingentanz den Tod. Viele Spinner fielen, doch das Blutgesponnene Netz hielt, bis das Flaggschiff den Aufruhr des Warp verließ."
languages.original_text: "The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the spinners emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many spinners fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the turmoil of the warp."

traits.locale_text: "Die erschöpfte Crew war zu schwach und ausgemergelt, um den Eindringlingen etwas entgegenzusetzen ... Doch dann kamen die Spinner aus den Tiefen. Sie stellten sich allein gegen hunderte von Feinden, doch sie wankten nicht. Sie schliefen nicht und ruhten nicht, unermüdlich brachte ihr Klingentanz den Tod. Viele Spinner fielen, doch das Blutgesponnene Netz hielt, bis das Flaggschiff den Aufruhr des Warp verließ."

"Die erschöpfte Crew war zu schwach und ausgemergelt, um den Eindringlingen etwas entgegenzusetzen ... Doch dann kamen die Weber aus den Tiefen. Sie stellten sich allein gegen hunderte von Feinden, doch sie wankten nicht. Sie schliefen nicht und ruhten nicht, unermüdlich brachte ihr Klingentanz den Tod. Viele Weber fielen, doch das Blutgesponnene Netz hielt, bis das Flaggschiff das Reich des Erzfeinds verließ."

languages.text: "Dermansız kalan mürettebat, istilacılara direnemeyecek kadar güçsüz ve zayıf düşmüştü. Ancak geminin derinliklerinden dokurlar ortaya çıktı. Yüzlerce düşmanın karşısına yalnız başlarına dikilseler de yalpalamadılar. Kılıçlarıyla ettikleri dans ölüm saçarken ne uyudular ne de dinlendiler. Nice dokur nihayete erse de Kanipi Ağı, sancak gemisi öteboyut hengamesinden ayrılana dek dayandı."
languages.original_text: "The exhausted crew was too weak and emaciated to resist the invaders... but then the spinners emerged from the depths. They stood alone against hundreds of foes, yet they did not falter. They did not sleep or rest as their bladetip dance brought death. Though many spinners fell, the Bloodspun Web held strong until the flagship left the turmoil of the warp."
